Title: No Transfer for initial supplyÂ creation
Content:
Consider emitting an event `Transfer(0x0, msg.sender, INITIAL_SUPPLY)` in the [constructor](https://github.com/element-group/enigma-erc20-smart-contract/blob/9b6a6edab5eaf79242cc59d705f8b315657f87b7/contracts/EnigmaToken.sol#L38). This is consistent with the [recommended behavior](https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-20-token-standard.md#transfer) for token creation, and will improve the user experience. For example, the created token amount will be immediately displayed in the Etherscan token interface.


***Update:** Event added in [`84412e9`](https://github.com/element-group/enigma-erc20-smart-contract/commit/84412e9a899734f6845ed645837f370c702b5a82).*
